entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #52358
  • Interactive component looses state on Navigate to same page #52356
  • [Blazor] Better diagnostics for running on WebAssembly. #52354
  • dotnet 7.0 and dotnet 8.0 are incompatible (host part) #52352
  • Implement JavaScript click event functions for easy use in Blazor #52349
  • [Blazor] Hot Reload not working properly when applying rendermode InteractiveServer to razor page in .NET 8.0.100 #52348
  • .NET 8.0 Blazor Web App EditForm loses values #52347
  • My project whichi is working correctlly in visualstudio2022 v17.6 does not work after updating vs to v17.8 #52346
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52345
  • The JSON returned by SignalR does not contain the $type field #52342

Closed

  • RenderMode not working with razor class libraries #52129
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #52344
  • IHttpClientFactory.GetClient(string name) to access a mutated HttpClient instance #52334
  • Static files can't be served from the root when a Razor page component matches that route with param #52320
  • Blazor Api call in OnInitializedAsync() with auth and UserMiddleware crash #52350
  • OnInitialized and OnInitializedAsync are called twice with @rendermode InteractiveServer #52208
  • [Feature] Async version of `IWebHostBuilder.ConfigureServices` #51035
  • Upgrading Blazor Server app to .Net 8 throws error 'The output byte buffer is too small...' #52186
  • RDG generated code error When FromRoute|FromQuery etc with `Name` arg #52343
  • blazor will auto add tag in img or css but with it added in JS it will not? #38709
    Planning: WebUI
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef #52318
  • [Blazor .NET8] In interactive Auto, services created in clients cannot be found if injected in components. #52341
  • NotifyPropertyChanged + Blazor Server UI Thread #52217

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix enhanced form handling use defalt enctype, honor enctype and formenctype #52359
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Try to load the assembly when finding out a root component or a parameter in webassembly #52351
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [Blazor] Try to load the assembly when finding out a root component or a parameter in webassembly #52331
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (6.0). #52260
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
